  • Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.model.ws.UpgradeToWebSocket
    use the WebSocketUpgrade attribute instead since Akka HTTP 10.2.0
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.coding.StreamDecoder
    StreamDecoder is internal API and will be moved or removed in the future. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.DefaultSSLContextCreation
    use ConnectionContext.httpsServer and httpsClient directly. Since 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.model.ws.UpgradeToWebSocket
    This low-level API has been replaced by an attribute. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.directives.FormFieldDirectives.FieldDef
    Use new `formFields` overloads with FieldSpec parameters. Kept for binary compatibility. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.directives.FormFieldDirectives.FieldMagnet
    Use new `formField` overloads with FieldSpec parameters. Kept for binary compatibility. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.directives.ParameterDirectives.ParamDef
    Use new `parameters` overloads with ParamSpec parameters. Kept for binary compatibility. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.directives.ParameterDirectives.ParamMagnet
    Use new `parameters` overloads with ParamSpec parameters. Kept for binary compatibility. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.

    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.model.MediaTypes.APPLICATION_EXCEL
    This format is unofficial and should not be used. Use {@link{#APPLICATION_VND_MS_EXCEL} instead.

    This format is unofficial and should not be used. Use {@link{#FONT_WOFF} instead.

    deprecated in favor of URI_TOO_LONG
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.model.StatusCodes.REQUESTED_RANGE_NOT_SATISFIABLE
    deprecated in favor of RANGE_NOT_SATISFIABLE
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.model.StatusCodes.UNORDERED_COLLECTION
    Non-standard Unordered Collection should not be used, deprecated in favor of TOO_EARLY

    Method Description
    org.apache.pekko.http.impl.settings.RoutingSettingsImpl.fileIODispatcher()
    binary compatibility method. Use `pekko.stream.materializer.blocking-io-dispatcher` to configure the dispatcher. Since Akka HTTP 10.1.6.
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.coding.Coder.encode​(ByteString)
    Synchronous encoding is deprecated since Akka HTTP 10.2.0
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.ConnectionContext.https​(SSLContext)
    use httpsServer, httpsClient or the method that takes a custom factory. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.ConnectionContext.sslConfig()
    Not always available. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.ConnectionContext$.https​(SSLContext)
    use httpsServer, httpsClient or the method that takes a custom factory. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.Http.bind​(ConnectHttp)
    since Akka HTTP 10.2.0: Use Http.get(system).newServerAt(interface, port).connectionSource() instead
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.Http.bindAndHandle​(Flow<HttpRequest, HttpResponse, ?>, ConnectHttp, Materializer)
    since Akka HTTP 10.2.0: Use Http.get(system).newServerAt(interface, port).bindFlow(handler) instead.
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.Http.bindAndHandleAsync​(Function<HttpRequest, CompletionStage<HttpResponse>>, ConnectHttp, Materializer)
    since Akka HTTP 10.2.0: Use Http.get(system).newServerAt(interface, port).bind(handler) instead
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.Http.bindAndHandleSync​(Function<HttpRequest, HttpResponse>, ConnectHttp, Materializer)
    since Akka HTTP 10.2.0: Use Http.get(system).newServerAt(interface, port).bindSync(handler) instead
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.Http.createClientHttpsContext​(PekkoSSLConfig)
    use ConnectionContext.httpsClient. Since 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.Http.createDefaultClientHttpsContext()
    use ConnectionContext.httpsClient. Since 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.Http.createServerHttpsContext​(PekkoSSLConfig)
    use ConnectionContext.httpsServer. Since 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.Http.defaultServerHttpContext()
    since Akka HTTP 10.2.0: set context explicitly when binding
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.Http.setDefaultServerHttpContext​(ConnectionContext)
    since Akka HTTP 10.2.0: set context explicitly when binding
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.HttpsConnectionContext.getClientAuth()
    here for binary compatibility. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.

    here for binary compatibility. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.HttpsConnectionContext.getEnabledProtocols()
    here for binary compatibility. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.HttpsConnectionContext.getSslContext()
    here for binary compatibility, not always available. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.HttpsConnectionContext.getSslParameters()
    here for binary compatibility. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.model.FormData.toEntity​(HttpCharset)
    FormData always uses charset UTF-8 without appending the charset to 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded', use toEntity() instead.
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.model.headers.HttpCookie.create​(String, String, Optional<DateTime>, OptionalLong, Optional<String>, Optional<String>, boolean, boolean, Optional<String>)
    Since 10.2.0. Use HttpCookie.create(String, String, Optional, OptionalLong, Optional, Optional, boolean, boolean, Optional, Optional) instead.
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.server.directives.RouteDirectives.route​(Route...)
    Use the RouteDirectives.concat method instead.

    use webSocketUpgrade instead since Akka HTTP 10.2.0

    Kept for binary compatibility; Use websocketSettings.withRandomFactoryFactory instead. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.unmarshalling.sse.EventStreamUnmarshalling.fromEventStream()
    Binary compatibility method. Invocations should have an implicit ActorSystem in scope to provide access to configuration. Since Akka HTTP 10.1.8.
    org.apache.pekko.http.javadsl.unmarshalling.sse.EventStreamUnmarshalling$.fromEventStream()
    Binary compatibility method. Invocations should have an implicit ActorSystem in scope to provide access to configuration. Since Akka HTTP 10.1.8.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.coding.Deflate.withLevel​(int)
    Use Coders.Deflate(compressionLevel = ...) instead. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.coding.Encoder.encode​(ByteString)
    synchronous compression with `encode` is not supported in the future any more, use `encodeAsync` instead. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.

    newCompressor is internal API. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.

    newEncodeTransformer is internal API. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.

    Use Coders.Gzip(compressionLevel = ...) instead. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.

    Internal method, left for binary compatibility. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.

    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.model.headers.HttpCookie.unapply​(HttpCookie)
    Pattern matching on HttpCookie is deprecated because of the big number of fields and potential future compatibility hazards. Please use other means to check the fields. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.

    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.directives.FormFieldDirectives.formField​(FormFieldDirectives.FieldMagnet)

    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.directives.FormFieldDirectives.formFields​(FormFieldDirectives.FieldMagnet)
    Use new `formField` overloads with FieldSpec parameters. Kept for binary compatibility. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.directives.HeaderDirectives.headerValueByName​(Symbol)
    Use string argument version or `headerValueByType`, e.g. instead of `headerValueByName('Referer)` use `headerValueByType(Referer)`. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.directives.HeaderDirectives.optionalHeaderValueByName​(Symbol)
    Use string argument version or `headerValueByType`, e.g. instead of `optionalHeaderValueByName('Referer)` use `optionalHeaderValueByType(Referer)`. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.directives.HeaderMagnet$.fromUnitForModeledCustomHeader​(BoxedUnit, ClassTag<T>, ModeledCustomHeaderCompanion<T>)
    Pass the companion object to headerValueByType as a parameter instead, e.g. `headerValueByType(Origin)` instead of `headerValueByType[Origin](())`. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.directives.LowPriorityHeaderMagnetImplicits.fromUnitNormalHeader​(BoxedUnit, ClassTag<T>)
    Pass the companion object to headerValueByType as a parameter instead, e.g. `headerValueByType(Origin)` instead of `headerValueByType[Origin](())`. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.directives.ParameterDirectives.parameter​(ParameterDirectives.ParamMagnet)
    Use new `parameters` overloads with ParamSpec parameters. Kept for binary compatibility. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.directives.ParameterDirectives.parameters​(ParameterDirectives.ParamMagnet)
    Use new `parameters` overloads with ParamSpec parameters. Kept for binary compatibility. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.

    use `extractWebSocketUpgrade` instead. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.LowerPriorityRouteResultImplicits.routeToFlowViaMaterializer​(Function1<RequestContext, Future<RouteResult>>, Materializer)
    make an ActorSystem available implicitly instead. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.Route.asyncHandler​(Function1<RequestContext, Future<RouteResult>>, RoutingSettings, ParserSettings, Materializer, RoutingLog, ExecutionContextExecutor, RejectionHandler, ExceptionHandler)
    Use `toFunction` instead, which only requires an implicit ActorSystem and no rejection/exception handlers. Use directives to specify custom exceptions or rejection handlers. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.Route.handlerFlow​(Function1<RequestContext, Future<RouteResult>>, RoutingSettings, ParserSettings, Materializer, RoutingLog, ExecutionContextExecutor, RejectionHandler, ExceptionHandler)
    Replaced by `toFlow` that takes an implicit ActorSystem. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.Route$.asyncHandler​(Function1<RequestContext, Future<RouteResult>>, RoutingSettings, ParserSettings, Materializer, RoutingLog, ExecutionContextExecutor, RejectionHandler, ExceptionHandler)
    Use `toFunction` instead, which only requires an implicit ActorSystem and no rejection/exception handlers. Use directives to specify custom exceptions or rejection handlers. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.Route$.handlerFlow​(Function1<RequestContext, Future<RouteResult>>, RoutingSettings, ParserSettings, Materializer, RoutingLog, ExecutionContextExecutor, RejectionHandler, ExceptionHandler)
    Replaced by `toFlow` that takes an implicit ActorSystem. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.server.RouteResult$.route2HandlerFlow​(Function1<RequestContext, Future<RouteResult>>, RoutingSettings, ParserSettings, Materializer, RoutingLog, ExecutionContext, RejectionHandler, ExceptionHandler)
    Replaced by routeToFlow. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.

    Use forServer or forClient instead. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.settings.ParserSettings$.apply​(Config)
    Use forServer or forClient instead. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.settings.RoutingSettings.fileIODispatcher()
    binary compatibility method. Use `pekko.stream.materializer.blocking-io-dispatcher` to configure the dispatcher. Since Akka HTTP 10.1.6.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.settings.RoutingSettings.getFileIODispatcher()
    binary compatibility method. Use `pekko.stream.materializer.blocking-io-dispatcher` to configure the dispatcher. Since Akka HTTP 10.1.6.

    binary compatibility method. Use `pekko.stream.materializer.blocking-io-dispatcher` to configure the dispatcher. Since Akka HTTP 10.1.6.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.settings.ServerSettings.getWebsocketRandomFactory()
    Kept for binary compatibility; Use websocketSettings.getRandomFactory instead. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.settings.ServerSettings.remoteAddressHeader()
    use remote-address-attribute instead. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.

    Kept for binary compatibility; Use websocketSettings.randomFactory instead. Since Akka HTTP 10.1.1.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.settings.ServerSettings.withWebsocketRandomFactory​(Supplier<Random>)
    Kept for binary compatibility; Use websocketSettings.withRandomFactoryFactory instead. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.unmarshalling.sse.EventStreamUnmarshalling.fromEventStream()
    Binary compatibility method. Invocations should have an implicit ActorSystem in scope to provide access to configuration. Since Akka HTTP 10.1.8.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.unmarshalling.sse.EventStreamUnmarshalling.maxEventSize()
    Set this property in configuration as `pekko.http.sse.max-event-size` before calling fromEventsStream(implicit ActorSystem). Since Akka HTTP 10.1.8.
    org.apache.pekko.http.scaladsl.unmarshalling.sse.EventStreamUnmarshalling.maxLineSize()
    Set this property in configuration as `pekko.http.sse.max-line-size` before calling fromEventsStream(implicit ActorSystem). Since Akka HTTP 10.1.8.

    Binary compatibility method. Invocations should have an implicit ActorSystem in scope to provide access to configuration. Since Akka HTTP 10.1.8.

    prefer ConnectionContext.httpsClient or ConnectionContext.httpsServer. Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.

    Please use HttpCookie(name, value).withXxx(). Since Akka HTTP 10.2.0.
